text: Well, well... if it isn't the THIEF again. What do you want this time?
Oh, nothing much. Just checking on you after a long day at work.
Wait a second... what's that in your pocket?
Is that medicine? Where did you get it?!
I knew it! You really ARE a thief! You must've stolen it from someone important!
I'm going to report you to the factory boss and take your job. Maybe even get promoted to a higher floor.
Go ahead. The factory boss sent me to get this medicine for him.
I just arrived too late. He's already dead, and now I'm left holding a few ampoules of medicine.
And don't even think I'll give you any. I don't care if you think I'm a thief.
The elder needs them more than either of us ever will.
Tch. Fine. Do whatever you want. It's not like anyone cares what happens down here anyway.
Just don't come crying to me when that old man's gone too.
